content: उक्थं [वच्-थक्] {@--1@} A saying, sentence, verse, hymn (स्तोत्रं). {@--2@} Eulogy, praise. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the Sāmaveda (<ls>Trik.</ls>); a variety of Sāma; (सामभेदः सामविशेषः). {@--4@} (In ritual) A kind of recitation or certain recited verses (<ab>opp.</ab> सामन् chanted, and यजुस् muttered verses). {@--5@} The उक्थ sacrifice. --क्था <ab>N.</ab> of a metre, see Appendix
